name: Amazing Spider Boy Hero Game
description:
Start your journey by playing a role of super hero in this adventurous game, and fight for your glory. destroy evil people and save innocent people and make them love you. You will face bad gangsters and bad cops; you just have to eliminate them to get your game progress higher.
Follow the instructions to get missions done. You will be guided throughout the game
Some of the prominent features are;
• Biggest open world environment
• Roam in the city freely
• Collect cash money and weapons
• Drive the plenty of cars
• A large number of weapons to select from.
• Huge amount of ammunition
• Buy different type of outfits
• Smooth controls
• High graphics renders
• Realistic environment.
developers: Hafiz Muhammad Farhan Mamoon Muhammad Mamoon Ul Haq
publishers: Hafiz Muhammad Farhan Mamoon Muhammad Mamoon Ul Haq
